name: Digging For Dinosaurs
description:
Back of Case - Nintendo DS (US) (from Ad Blurbs)

Travel the World on an Expedition to Unearth Dinosaurs!

  • Dinosaur Facts - Separate fact from myth as you unearth 21 different dinosaurs like Tyrannosaurus Rex, Brachiosaurus and Microraptor!
  • Eight Dinosaur Games - Battle dinosaurs, scavenge for food and more while playing games that show how dinosaurs survived in the wild.
  • Digging adventures - Play games to earn points for dinosaur digs and then rebuild the dinosaur bones you find to display in the Hall of Dinosaurs!
